section.heading: Cooperation from other agencies.
section.text: Agencies of the District of Columbia government shall cooperate in providing such information to the Commission as may be necessary to fulfill its statutory responsibilities.

annotations.annotation: Anatomical Gift Act, see § 7-1521.01 et seq.
Cemetery associations, regulations, construction of law, see § 43-131.
Human tissue banks, application of law, see § 7-1541.06.
